b7fef8e6-fce3-406f-aa32-7d8903258666.name: deployment.environment
b7fef8e6-fce3-406f-aa32-7d8903258666.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT(JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment_environment'))
FROM signoz_metrics.time_series_v2
WHERE metric_name like '%redpanda%'
